含义: The character '首' primarily means 'head' or 'chief'. It can also denote the beginning or the first in a series.
字形: '首' is a pictographic character that resembles the shape of a head with hair. It consists of two parts: the top part represents the hair, and the bottom part represents the head.
读音: The pronunciation of '首' is 'shǒu' in Mandarin.
字源: The character '首' originated from ancient pictographs that depicted a human head. Over time, the character evolved into its current form, simplifying the depiction of the head and hair.
常用词组: 首先 (shǒu xiān) - first of all
首尾 (shǒu wěi) - beginning and end
成语: 首当其冲 (shǒu dāng qí chōng) - to bear the brunt
首屈一指 (shǒu qū yī zhǐ) - second to none
首鼠两端 (shǒu shǔ liǎng duān) - indecisive
首善之区 (shǒu shàn zhī qū) - the best place
例句: 他是我们团队的首领。 (Tā shì wǒmen tuánduì de shǒu lǐng.) - He is the leader of our team.
首先，我们需要明确目标。 (Shǒu xiān, wǒmen xūyào míngquè mùbiāo.) - First of all, we need to clarify our goals.
短故事: 在古代，有一个国王非常重视他的首脑会议。每次会议，他都会亲自出席，确保每个决定都是经过深思熟虑的。 (In ancient times, there was a king who valued his head meetings greatly. He would attend every meeting personally to ensure that every decision was well-considered.)
有一个村庄，村民们选举了一位首领来管理日常事务。这位首领非常公正，深受村民们的爱戴。 (In a village, the villagers elected a leader to manage daily affairs. This leader was very fair and deeply loved by the villagers.)
诗词: 《静夜思》 - 李白: '床前明月光，疑是地上霜。举头望明月，低头思故乡。' (The bright moonlight before my bed, I suspect it's frost on the ground. I raise my head to gaze at the bright moon, then lower it, thinking of my hometown.)
《登鹳雀楼》 - 王之涣: '白日依山尽，黄河入海流。欲穷千里目，更上一层楼。' (The sun sets behind the mountains, the Yellow River flows into the sea. To extend the view a thousand miles, ascend yet one more floor.)
